title: LLM-powered Ticket Resolution System
description: Developed an advanced system that uses LLMs to analyze and assist in resolving technical support tickets, resulting in a 27% reduction in average ticket closing time.

title: Developer AI Assistant
description: Built a context-aware developer chatbot that integrates with multiple internal knowledge bases using advanced RAG techniques to assist developers with their CI/CD workflows.

title: Agent-based Slack Support Bot
description: Created an AI-powered Slack bot utilizing multi-agent architecture to automatically resolve 22% of support requests without human intervention.

title: DevOps Analytics Platform
description: Engineered a data analytics platform for comparing CI/CD metrics between different DevOps platforms, helping drive the transition from Jenkins to GitHub Actions.
